agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.p1: By accessing and using BookNest, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using this service.

description.title: Description of Service
description.p1: BookNest is a web-based book management platform that allows users to discover, manage, and get AI-powered recommendations for books. Users can create accounts, upload book information, manage personal libraries, add favorites, and interact with the community through comments and reactions.

accounts.p1: When you create an account with us, you agree to:
list: Provide accurate and complete information
Maintain the security of your account credentials
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
Not create multiple accounts or share accounts

Your content does not infringe on intellectual property rights
Your content does not violate any laws or regulations
You will not upload malicious, offensive, or inappropriate content

aiContent.title: AI-Generated Content
aiContent.p1: BookNest uses AI to generate book summaries and recommendations. While we strive for accuracy, AI-generated content may contain errors or inaccuracies. This content is provided for informational purposes only and should not be considered professional advice.

community.title: Community Guidelines
community.p1: When interacting with other users through comments and reactions:

Keep discussions relevant to books and literature
Do not post spam, advertisements, or promotional content
Respect diverse opinions and perspectives
Report inappropriate content to book owners or administrators
